value: SELECT DISTINCT 80, DB_NAME(), 170, ''Reliability'', ''Max File Size Set'', ''https://BrentOzar.com/go/maxsize'', (''The ['' + DB_NAME() + ''] database file '' + name + '' has a max file size set to '' + CAST(CAST(max_size AS BIGINT) * 8 / 1024 AS VARCHAR(100)) + ''MB. If it runs out of space, the database will stop working even though there may be drive space available.'') FROM
